title: A1: Implementing the Kanbas User Interface
description: This section walks through several exercises to familiarize with HTML. First setup a development environment and then practice several HTML exercises.

title: A2: Styling Kanbas with CSS and Bootstrap
description: This section presents several CSS, Bootstrap, and React Icons exercises to practice and learn how to style HTML documents.

title: A3: Implementing a Data Driven Kanbas Application
description: This section presents JavaScript and React.js examples to program the browser, interact with the user, and generate dynamic user interfaces.
